data.chText: 完美的；理想的；最合适的
这个海滩是孩子的理想去处。
data.enText: This beach is ideal for children.

data.chText: 她是这项工作最合适的人选。
data.enText: She's the ideal candidate for the job.

data.chText: 去巴黎旅行将是我练习法语的绝好机会。
data.enText: The trip to Paris will be an ideal opportunity to practise my French.
existing only in your imagination or as an idea; not likely to be real

data.chText: 在理想的世界里将没有贫穷和疾病。
data.enText: In an ideal world there would be no poverty and disease.
She's ideally suited for this job.

data.chText: 按理想来说，我希望住在纽约，但那是不可能的。
data.enText: Ideally, I'd like to live in New York, but that's not possible.

data.chText: 理想；看似完美的思想（或标准）
data.enText: an idea or standard that seems perfect, and worth trying to achieve or obtain

data.chText: 她觉得很难达到他的高标准要求。
data.enText: She found it hard to live up to his high ideals.
a person or thing that you think is perfect

data.chText: 这是我心目中完美的家庭住宅。
data.enText: It's my ideal of what a family home should be.

means: 看似完美的思想(或标准)

ex.chText: 医生已经给她提供了如何达到理想体重的建议。
ex.enText: The doctor has offered her advice on how to reach an ideal weight.

ex.chText: 该项目为学生提供了了解外国文化的极好机会。
ex.enText: The program offers an ideal opportunity for students to learn about foreign culture.

ex.chText: 这个海滩是度假的理想去处。
ex.enText: This beach is ideal for a vacation.

synonyms.bx: 指在所有可能的选择中最好的或最适合的。

ex.chText: 太完美了！这个发型正是我想要的。
ex.enText: That's perfect! This hair style is just what I wanted.

ex.chText: 白葡萄酒是吃鱼时绝佳的佐餐酒。
ex.enText: White wine makes a perfect accompaniment to fish.

synonyms.bx: 强调无可挑剔、完美无缺的。

tr: the idea of something that is perfect
something that one hopes to attain
model of excellence or perfection of a kind
constituting or existing only in the form of an idea or mental image or conception
example: a poem or essay may be typical of its period in idea or ideal content

tr: conforming to an ultimate standard of perfection or excellence
of or relating to the philosophical doctrine of the reality of ideas

value.def: An ideal is a principle, idea, or standard that seems very good and worth trying to achieve.

example.ex: ...the bohemian ideals of truth, beauty, freedom and love.
example.tran: 崇信真、美、自由与爱的波西米亚式理想

example.ex: I tried to live up to my ideal of myself.
example.tran: 我努力活出理想的自我。

value.def: Your ideal of something is the person or thing that seems to you to be the best possible example of it.

example.tran: 日本人理想中的美人形象

example.ex: Throughout his career she remained his feminine ideal.
example.tran: 在他整个职业生涯中，她一直是他心中完美女性的代表。

value.def: The ideal person or thing for a particular task or purpose is the best possible person or thing for it.

example.ex: She decided that I was the ideal person to take over the job...
example.tran: 她认定我是接手这份工作的最佳人选。

example.ex: I really love the area and see it as an ideal place to start my managerial career...
example.tran: 我真的很喜欢那个地区，把它视为开创我管理事业的理想之地。

example.ex: The conditions were ideal for racing.
example.tran: 当时的天气最适合比赛。

value.def: An ideal society or world is the best possible one that you can imagine.

example.ex: We do not live in an ideal world...
example.tran: 我们并非生活在完美的世界里。

example.ex: In an ideal world, there would be no such thing as rubbish...
example.tran: 在一个理想世界中，不会有垃圾之类的东西。

example.ex: Their ideal society collapsed around them into the Terror and then into the Counterrevolution.
example.tran: 他们所处的理想社会崩溃了，社会进入恐怖时期，接着是反革命时期。

trans: 领先典范；【汽车品牌】理想智造

partsOfSpeech.dec: ideal 理想 + ism 表名词 → 唯心主义
ideal 理想 + ize …化 → 理想化
idea 思想，观点 +〔a〕te 做，造成，使… → 形成思想 → 设想
ideo 思想，观点 + graph 写，画 → 写观点的字 → 表意文字
ideo 思想，观点 + logy …学 → 思想的学习 → 意识形态
